author: sgtoj
body:
As the title asks, please add the ability to quickly reload environment variables on Windows platform using PS 6. This is is trivial task for linux users via (generally) executing `source ./bashrc`. However, it is a very convoluted and/or verbose process to achieve the same affect on Windows. 

```
# example: updating PATH and using it in the same session
$env:Path += ";c:\bin";
[Environment]::SetEnvironmentVariable("Path", $env:Path, [EnvironmentVariableTarget]::Machine)
```
title: Add Functionality to Reload Environment Variables
